text: @gina_din @Naythan_DK @Leon_Mann @JasonRoberts30 @VictorWanyama @Nmwendwa @LuolDeng9 @sergeibaka @farouq1 @Football_Kenya @YayaToure @MichKatami They are not investing I  the current young generation so they sure won't going to invest in Sport unless it involves brown envelopes of cash! Corruption is what many African leaders do well and best!
